desc.value: A medium game with up to four factions, battling and scheming for the control of the northern hemisphere of Arrakis.
A long-lasting campaign on the nothern hemisphere of Arrakis. Will your House survive the Spice Wars and come out victorious? Or will you perish, and be forgotten?
A fast and thrilling duel for revenge and power. Two factions enter the fray. Only one can leave with their head held high.
Learn how to play Dune: Spice Wars
